sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Merck & Co. ( MRK ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, Merck & Co. registers a 6.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron Corporation ( CVX ), trading down 1.1%.
Chevron Corporation is lower by about 2.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Visa ( V ), trading down 0.2%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 1.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
